00028 template <class FRM>
00029 XNMRSpectrumBase<FRM>::XNMRSpectrumBase(const char *name, bool runtime,
00030                            const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00031                            const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,

00033                            const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers)

00035       m_pulse(create<XItemNode<XDriverList, XNMRPulseAnalyzer> >("PulseAnalyzer", false, drivers, true)),
00036       m_bandWidth(create<XDoubleNode>("BandWidth", false)),

00042       m_windowFunc(create<XComboNode>("WindowFunc", false, true)),
00043       m_windowWidth(create<XDoubleNode>("WindowWidth", false)),
00044       m_form(new FRM(g_pFrmMain)),
00045       m_statusPrinter(XStatusPrinter::create(m_form.get())),
00046       m_spectrum(create<XWaveNGraph>("Spectrum", true,
00047                                      m_form->m_graph, m_form->m_urlDump, m_form->m_btnDump)),
00048       m_solver(create<SpectrumSolverWrapper>("SpectrumSolver", true, m_solverList, m_windowFunc, m_windowWidth)) {
00049     m_form->m_btnClear->setIcon(
00050         KIconLoader::global()->loadIcon("editdelete",
00051                                                                 KIconLoader::Toolbar, KIconLoader::SizeSmall, true ) );
00052

00055     {
00056         const char *labels[] = {"X", "Re [V]", "Im [V]", "Weights", "Abs [V]", "Dark [V]"};

00070         m_spectrum->plot(0)->drawPoints()->value(false);
00071         m_spectrum->plot(0)->drawLines()->value(true);
00072         m_spectrum->plot(0)->drawBars()->value(true);

00074         m_spectrum->plot(0)->lineColor()->value(QColor(0x60, 0x60, 0xc0).rgb());
00075         m_spectrum->plot(0)->intensity()->value(0.5);
00076         m_spectrum->plot(3)->label()->value(i18n("dark"));
00077         m_spectrum->plot(3)->drawBars()->value(false);
00078         m_spectrum->plot(3)->drawLines()->value(true);
00079         m_spectrum->plot(3)->lineColor()->value(QColor(0xa0, 0xa0, 0x00).rgb());
00080         m_spectrum->plot(3)->drawPoints()->value(false);
00081         m_spectrum->plot(3)->intensity()->value(0.5);
00082         m_spectrum->clear();

00085                 "Peaks", true, m_spectrum->graph());

00089             plot->axisY()->value(m_spectrum->axisy());

00094             plot->displayMajorGrid()->value(false);

00096             plot->barColor()->value(QColor(0xa0, 0x00, 0xa0).rgb());
00097             plot->clearPoints()->setUIEnabled(false);
00098             plot->maxCount()->setUIEnabled(false);
00099         }
00100     }
00101   
00102     bandWidth()->value(50);
00103     bwList()->add("50%");
00104     bwList()->add("100%");

00124         m_form->m_cmbWindowFunc);

00127         shared_from_this(), &XNMRSpectrumBase<FRM>::onClear);

00137 template <class FRM>
00138 XNMRSpectrumBase<FRM>::~XNMRSpectrumBase() {
00139 }
00140 template <class FRM>
00141 void
00142 XNMRSpectrumBase<FRM>::showForms()
00143 {
00144     m_form->show();
00145     m_form->raise();

00147 template <class FRM>
00148 void
00149 XNMRSpectrumBase<FRM>::onCondChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node)
00150 {
00151     if((node == phase()) && *autoPhase()) return;
00152     if((node == bandWidth()) || onCondChangedImpl(node))
00153         m_timeClearRequested = XTime::now();
00154     requestAnalysis();
00155 }
00156 template <class FRM>
00157 void
00158 XNMRSpectrumBase<FRM>::onClear(const shared_ptr<XNode> &)
00159 {
00160     m_timeClearRequested = XTime::now();
00161     requestAnalysis();
00162 }
00163 template <class FRM>
00164 bool
00165 XNMRSpectrumBase<FRM>::checkDependency(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) const {
00166     shared_ptr<XNMRPulseAnalyzer> _pulse = *pulse();
00167     if(!_pulse) return false;
00168     if(emitter == shared_from_this()) return true;
00169     return (emitter == _pulse) && checkDependencyImpl(emitter);
00170 }
00171 template <class FRM>
00172 void
00173 XNMRSpectrumBase<FRM>::analyze(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) throw (XRecordError&)
00174 {
00175     shared_ptr<XNMRPulseAnalyzer> _pulse = *pulse();
00176     ASSERT( _pulse );
00177  
00178     if(*_pulse->exAvgIncr()) {
00179         m_statusPrinter->printWarning(i18n("Do NOT use incremental avg. Skipping."));
00180         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00181     }
00182 
00183     bool clear = (m_timeClearRequested > _pulse->timeAwared());
00184   
00185     double interval = _pulse->interval();
00186     double df = _pulse->dFreq();
00187     
00188     double res = getFreqResHint();
00189     res = df * std::max(1L, lrint(res / df - 0.5));
00190     
00191     double _max = getMaxFreq();
00192     double _min = getMinFreq();
00193     
00194     if(_max <= _min) {
00195         throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("Invalid min. and max."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00196     }
00197     if(res * 65536 * 2 < _max - _min) {
00198         throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("Too small resolution."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00199     }
00200 
00201     if(fabs(log(resRecorded() / res)) < log(2.0))
00202         res = resRecorded();
00203     
00204     if((resRecorded() != res) || clear) {
00205         m_resRecorded = res;
00206         for(int bank = 0; bank < ACCUM_BANKS; bank++) {
00207             m_accum[bank].clear();
00208             m_accum_weights[bank].clear();
00209             m_accum_dark[bank].clear();
00210         }
00211     }
00212     else {
00213         int diff = lrint(minRecorded() / res) - lrint(_min / res);
00214         for(int bank = 0; bank < ACCUM_BANKS; bank++) {
00215             for(int i = 0; i < diff; i++) {
00216                 m_accum[bank].push_front(0.0);
00217                 m_accum_weights[bank].push_front(0);
00218                 m_accum_dark[bank].push_front(0.0);
00219             }
00220             for(int i = 0; i < -diff; i++) {
00221                 if(!m_accum[bank].empty()) {
00222                     m_accum[bank].pop_front();
00223                     m_accum_weights[bank].pop_front();
00224                     m_accum_dark[bank].pop_front();
00225                 }
00226             }
00227         }
00228     }
00229     m_minRecorded = _min;
00230     int length = lrint((_max - _min) / res);
00231     for(int bank = 0; bank < ACCUM_BANKS; bank++) {
00232         m_accum[bank].resize(length, 0.0);
00233         m_accum_weights[bank].resize(length, 0);
00234         m_accum_dark[bank].resize(length, 0.0);
00235     }
00236     m_wave.resize(length);
00237     std::fill(m_wave.begin(), m_wave.end(), 0.0);
00238     m_weights.resize(length);
00239     std::fill(m_weights.begin(), m_weights.end(), 0.0);
00240     m_darkPSD.resize(length);
00241     std::fill(m_darkPSD.begin(), m_darkPSD.end(), 0.0);
00242 
00243     if(clear) {
00244         m_spectrum->clear();
00245         m_peaks.clear();
00246         _pulse->avgClear()->touch();
00247         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00248     }
00249 
00250     if(emitter == _pulse) {
00251         fssum();
00252         afterFSSum();
00253     }
00254     
00255     analyzeIFT();
00256     if(*autoPhase()) {
00257         std::complex<double> csum(0.0, 0.0);
00258         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < wave().size(); i++) {
00259             csum += wave()[i] * weights()[i];
00260         }
00261         double ph = 180.0 / M_PI * atan2(std::imag(csum), std::real(csum));
00262         if(fabs(ph) < 180.0)
00263             phase()->value(ph);
00264     }
00265     double ph = *phase() / 180.0 * M_PI;
00266     std::complex<double> cph = std::polar(1.0, -ph);
00267     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < wave().size(); i++) {
00268         m_wave[i] *= cph;
00269     }
00270 }
00271 template <class FRM>
00272 void
00273 XNMRSpectrumBase<FRM>::visualize()
00274 {
00275     if(!time()) {
00276         m_spectrum->clear();
00277         m_peakPlot->maxCount()->value(0);
00278         return;
00279     }
00280 
00281     int length = wave().size();
00282     std::vector<double> values;
00283     getValues(values);
00284     ASSERT(values.size() == length);
00285     {   XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*m_spectrum);
00286         double th = FFT::windowFuncHamming(0.1);
00287         m_spectrum->setRowCount(length);
00288         for(int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00289             m_spectrum->cols(0)[i] = values[i];
00290             m_spectrum->cols(1)[i] = std::real(wave()[i]);
00291             m_spectrum->cols(2)[i] = std::imag(wave()[i]);
00292             m_spectrum->cols(3)[i] = (weights()[i] > th) ? weights()[i] : 0.0;
00293             m_spectrum->cols(4)[i] = std::abs(wave()[i]);
00294             m_spectrum->cols(5)[i] = sqrt(darkPSD()[i]);
00295         }
00296         m_peakPlot->maxCount()->value(m_peaks.size());
00297         std::deque<XGraph::ValPoint> &points(m_peakPlot->points());
00298         points.resize(m_peaks.size());
00299         for(int i = 0; i < m_peaks.size(); i++) {
00300             double x = m_peaks[i].second;
00301             int j = lrint(x - 0.5);
00302             j = std::min(std::max(0, j), length - 2);
00303             double a = values[j] + (values[j + 1] - values[j]) * (x - j);
00304             points[i] = XGraph::ValPoint(a, m_peaks[i].first);
00305         }
00306     }
00307 }
00308 
00309 template <class FRM>
00310 void
00311 XNMRSpectrumBase<FRM>::fssum()
00312 {
00313     shared_ptr<XNMRPulseAnalyzer> _pulse = *pulse();
00314 
00315     int len = _pulse->ftWidth();
00316     double df = _pulse->dFreq();
00317     if((len == 0) || (df == 0)) {
00318         throw XRecordError(i18n("Invalid waveform."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00319     }
00320     //bw *= 1.8; // for Hamming.
00321     //  bw *= 3.6; // for FlatTop.
00322     //bw *= 2.2; // for Kaiser3.
00323     int bw = abs(lrint(*bandWidth() * 1000.0 / df * 2.2));
00324     if(bw >= len) {
00325         throw XRecordError(i18n("BW beyond Nyquist freq."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00326     }
00327     double cfreq = getCurrentCenterFreq();
00328     if(cfreq == 0) {
00329         throw XRecordError(i18n("Invalid center freq."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00330     }
00331     std::vector<std::complex<double> > ftwavein(len, 0.0), ftwaveout(len);
00332     if(!m_preFFT || (m_preFFT->length() != len)) {
00333         m_preFFT.reset(new FFT(-1, len));
00334     }
00335     int wlen = std::min(len, (int)_pulse->wave().size());
00336     int woff = -_pulse->waveFTPos() + len * ((_pulse->waveFTPos() > 0) ? ((int)_pulse->waveFTPos() / len + 1) : 0);
00337     for(int i = 0; i < wlen; i++) {
00338         int j = (i + woff) % len;
00339         ftwavein[j] = _pulse->wave()[i];
00340     }
00341     m_preFFT->exec(ftwavein, ftwaveout);
00342     bw /= 2.0;
00343     double normalize = 1.0 / (double)_pulse->wave().size();
00344     double darknormalize = resRecorded() / df;
00345     for(int bank = 0; bank < ACCUM_BANKS; bank++) {
00346         for(int i = -bw / 2; i <= bw / 2; i++) {
00347             double freq = i * df;
00348             int idx = lrint((cfreq + freq - minRecorded()) / resRecorded());
00349             if((idx >= (int)m_accum[bank].size()) || (idx < 0))
00350                 continue;
00351             double w = FFT::windowFuncKaiser1((double)i / bw);
00352             int j = (i + len) % len;
00353             m_accum[bank][idx] += ftwaveout[j] * w * normalize;
00354             m_accum_weights[bank][idx] += w;
00355             m_accum_dark[bank][idx] += _pulse->darkPSD()[j] * w * w * darknormalize;
00356         }
00357         bw *= 2.0;
00358     }
00359 }
00360 template <class FRM>
00361 void
00362 XNMRSpectrumBase<FRM>::analyzeIFT() {
00363     int bank = *bwList();
00364     if((bank < 0) || (bank >= ACCUM_BANKS))
00365         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00366     double bw_coeff = 0.5*pow(2.0, (double)bank);
00367     
00368     double th = FFT::windowFuncHamming(0.49);
00369     int max_idx = 0;
00370     int min_idx = m_accum[bank].size() - 1;
00371     int taps_max = 0; 
00372     for(int i = 0; i < m_accum[bank].size(); i++) {
00373         if(m_accum_weights[bank][i] > th) {
00374             min_idx = std::min(min_idx, i);
00375             max_idx = std::max(max_idx, i);
00376             taps_max++;
00377         }
00378     }
00379     if(max_idx <= min_idx)
00380         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00381     shared_ptr<XNMRPulseAnalyzer> _pulse = *pulse();
00382     double res = resRecorded();
00383     int iftlen = max_idx - min_idx + 1;
00384     int npad = lrint(6.0 / (res * _pulse->waveWidth() * _pulse->interval()) + 0.5); //# of pads in frequency domain.
00385     //Truncation factor for IFFT.
00386     int trunc2 = lrint(pow(2.0, ceil(log(iftlen * 0.03) / log(2.0))));
00387     if(trunc2 < 1)
00388         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00389     iftlen = ((iftlen * 3 / 2 + npad) / trunc2 + 1) * trunc2;
00390     int tdsize = lrint(_pulse->waveWidth() * _pulse->interval() * res * iftlen);
00391     int iftorigin = lrint(_pulse->waveFTPos() * _pulse->interval() * res * iftlen);
00392     int bwinv = abs(lrint(1.0/(*bandWidth() * bw_coeff * 1000.0 * _pulse->interval() * res * iftlen)));
00393     if(abs(iftorigin) > iftlen/2)
00394         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00395     
00396     if(!m_ift || (m_ift->length() != iftlen)) {
00397         m_ift.reset(new FFT(1, iftlen));
00398     }
00399     
00400     std::vector<std::complex<double> > fftwave(iftlen), iftwave(iftlen);
00401     std::fill(fftwave.begin(), fftwave.end(), 0.0);
00402     for(int i = min_idx; i <= max_idx; i++) {
00403         int k = (i - (max_idx + min_idx) / 2 + iftlen) % iftlen;
00404         if(m_accum_weights[bank][i] > th)
00405             fftwave[k] = m_accum[bank][i] / m_accum_weights[bank][i];
00406     }
00407     m_ift->exec(fftwave, iftwave);
00408     
00409     shared_ptr<SpectrumSolver> solver = m_solver->solver();
00410     std::vector<std::complex<double> > solverin;
00411     FFT::twindowfunc wndfunc = m_solver->windowFunc();
00412     double wndwidth = *windowWidth() / 100.0;
00413     double psdcoeff = 1.0;
00414     if(solver->isFT()) {
00415         std::vector<double> weight;
00416         SpectrumSolver::window(tdsize, -iftorigin, wndfunc, wndwidth, weight);
00417         double w = 0;
00418         for(int i = 0; i < tdsize; i++)
00419             w += weight[i] * weight[i];
00420         psdcoeff = w/(double)tdsize;
00421         //Compensate broadening due to convolution.
00422         solverin.resize(iftlen);
00423         double wlen = SpectrumSolver::windowLength(tdsize, -iftorigin, wndwidth);
00424         wlen += bwinv * 2; //effect of convolution.
00425         wndwidth = wlen / solverin.size();
00426         iftorigin = solverin.size()/2;  
00427     }
00428     else {
00429         solverin.resize(tdsize);
00430     }
00431     for(int i = 0; i < (int)solverin.size(); i++) {
00432         int k = (-iftorigin + i + iftlen) % iftlen;
00433         ASSERT(k >= 0);
00434         solverin[i] = iftwave[k];
00435     }
00436     try {
00437         solver->exec(solverin, fftwave, -iftorigin, 0.1e-2, wndfunc, wndwidth);
00438     }
00439     catch (XKameError &e) {
00440         throw XSkippedRecordError(e.msg(), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00441     }
00442 
00443     psdcoeff /= _pulse->waveWidth() * _pulse->interval();
00444     for(int i = min_idx; i <= max_idx; i++) {
00445         int k = (i - (max_idx + min_idx) / 2 + iftlen) % iftlen;
00446         m_wave[i] = fftwave[k] / (double)iftlen;
00447         double w = m_accum_weights[bank][i];
00448         m_weights[i] = w;
00449         m_darkPSD[i] = m_accum_dark[bank][i] / (w*w) * psdcoeff;
00450     }
00451     th = FFT::windowFuncHamming(0.1);
00452     m_peaks.clear();
00453     for(int i = 0; i < solver->peaks().size(); i++) {
00454         double k = solver->peaks()[i].second;
00455         double j = (k > iftlen/2) ? (k - iftlen) : k;
00456         j += (max_idx + min_idx) / 2;
00457         int l = lrint(j);
00458         if((l >= 0) && (l < weights().size()) && (weights()[l] > th))
00459             m_peaks.push_back(std::pair<double, double>(
00460                 solver->peaks()[i].first / (double)iftlen, j));
00461     }
00462 }
